name: Tower of Hell (Lotus Emperor)
description:
A tutorial-followed game, I've finished the tutorial, so I decided to upload the very first level of the game (Unleashed Crypt).

I'm intending to make 99 more levels, 100 in total, your support would greatly be appreciated.

--

Changelog:

Vr 0.1: added new sprites from ox72's Tilesets

New Dungeon

A simple, ugly main menu

Super duper secret room.

--

Credits:

Me (Of course!!)

Tileset: 0x72.itch.io/

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A tower mysteriously appeared in your world, monsters started to emerge from it, you as the chosen one, under the kings order is to clear this tower and rid the world of its suffering.

Go fair hero, a mysterious path awaits you!...
